verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> came again unto me <WH559>, saying,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, there were two <WH8147> women <WH802>, the daughters <WH1323> of one <WH259> mother <WH517>:

and they played the harlot <WH2181> in Egypt <WH4714>; they played the harlot <WH2181> in their youth <WH5271>; there were their breasts <WH7699> pressed <WH4600>, and there was handled <WH6213> the bosom <WH1717> of their virginity <WH1331>.

And the names <WH8034> of them were Oholah <WH170> the elder <WH1419>, and Oholibah <WH172> her sister <WH269>: and they became mine <WH3205>, and they bare sons <WH1121> and daughters <WH1323>. And as for their names <WH8034>, Samaria <WH8111> is Oholah <WH170>, and Jerusalem <WH3389> Oholibah <WH172>.
And Oholah <WH170> played the harlot <WH2181> when she was mine <WH8478>; and she doted <WH5689> on her lovers <WH157>, on the Assyrians <WH804> her neighbors <WH7138>,
who were clothed <WH3847> with blue <WH8504>, governors <WH6346> and rulers <WH5461>, all of them desirable <WH2531> young men <WH970>, horsemen <WH6571> riding <WH7392> upon horses <WH5483>.

And she bestowed <WH5414> her whoredoms <WH8457> upon them <WH4005>, the choicest men <WH1121> of Assyria <WH804> all of them <WH5689>; and on whomsoever she doted, with all their idols <WH1544> she defiled herself <WH2930>.

Neither hath she left <WH5800> her whoredoms <WH8457> since the days of Egypt <WH4714>; for in her youth <WH5271> they lay <WH7901> with her <WH6213>, and they handled the bosom <WH1717> of her virginity <WH1331>; and they poured <WH8210> out their whoredom upon her <WH8457>.
Wherefore I delivered <WH5414> her into the hand <WH3027> of her lovers <WH157>, into the hand <WH3027> of the Assyrians <WH1121>, upon whom she doted <WH5689>.

These uncovered <WH1540> her nakedness <WH6172>; they took <WH3947> her sons <WH1121> and her daughters <WH1323>; and her they slew <WH2026> with the sword <WH2719>: and she became a byword <WH8034> among women <WH802>; for they executed <WH6213> judgments upon her <WH8196>.

And her sister <WH269> Oholibah <WH172> saw <WH7200> this <WH7843>, yet was she more corrupt in her doting <WH5691> than she <WH8457>, and in her whoredoms which were more than the whoredoms <WH2183> of her sister <WH269>.

She doted <WH5689> upon the Assyrians <WH1121>, governors <WH6346> and rulers <WH5461>, her neighbors <WH7138>, clothed <WH3847> most gorgeously <WH4358>, horsemen <WH6571> riding <WH7392> upon horses <WH5483>, all of them desirable <WH2531> young men <WH970>.
And I saw <WH7200> that she was defiled <WH2930>; they both <WH8147> took one <WH259> way <WH1870>.

And she increased <WH3254> her whoredoms <WH8457>; for she saw <WH7200> men <WH582> portrayed <WH2707> upon the wall <WH7023>, the images <WH6754> of the Chaldeans <WH3778> portrayed <WH2710> with vermilion <WH8350>,

girded <WH2289> with girdles <WH232> upon their loins <WH4975>, with flowing <WH5628> turbans <WH2871> upon their heads <WH7218>, all of them princes <WH7991> to <WH4758> look upon <WH1823>, after the likeness of the Babylonians <WH1121> in Chaldea <WH3778>, the land <WH776> of their nativity <WH4138>.
And as soon <WH5869> as she saw <WH4758> them she doted <WH5689> upon them <WH7971>, and sent messengers <WH4397> unto them into Chaldea <WH3778>.

And the Babylonians <WH1121> came <WH935> to her into the bed <WH4904> of love <WH1730>, and they defiled <WH2930> her with their whoredom <WH8457>, and she was polluted <WH2930> with them <WH5315>, and her soul was alienated from them <WH3363>.

So she uncovered <WH1540> her whoredoms <WH8457>, and uncovered <WH1540> her nakedness <WH6172>: then my soul <WH5315> was alienated <WH3363> from her <WH5315>, like as my soul was alienated <WH5361> from her sister <WH269>.
Yet she multiplied <WH7235> her whoredoms <WH8457>, remembering <WH2142> the days <WH3117> of her youth <WH5271>, wherein she had played the harlot <WH2181> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
And she doted <WH5689> upon their paramours <WH6370>, whose flesh <WH1320> is as the flesh <WH1320> of asses <WH2543>, and whose issue <WH2231> is like the issue <WH2231> of horses <WH5483>.

Thus thou calledst to remembrance <WH6485> the lewdness <WH2154> of thy youth <WH5271>, in the handling <WH6213> of thy bosom <WH1717> by the Egyptians <WH4714> for the breasts <WH7699> of thy youth <WH5271>.

Therefore <WH172>, O Oholibah, thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>: Behold <WH5782>, I will raise up thy lovers <WH157> against thee <WH5315>, from whom thy soul is alienated <WH5361>, and I will bring <WH935> them against thee on every side <WH5439>:

the Babylonians <WH1121> and all the Chaldeans <WH3778>, Pekod <WH6489> and Shoa <WH7772> and Koa <WH6970>, and all the Assyrians <WH1121> with them <WH2531>; desirable young men <WH970>, governors <WH6346> and rulers <WH5461> all of them <WH5461>, princes and men <WH970> of renown <WH7392>, all of them riding upon horses <WH5483>.

And they shall come <WH935> against thee with weapons <WH2021>, chariots <WH7393>, and wagons <WH1534>, and with a company <WH6951> of peoples <WH5971>; they shall set <WH7760> themselves against thee with buckler <WH6793> and shield <WH4043> and helmet <WH6959> round about <WH5439>; and I will commit <WH5414> the judgment <WH4941> unto <WH6440> them <WH8199>, and they shall judge thee according to their judgments <WH4941>.

And I will set <WH5414> my jealousy <WH7068> against thee <WH6213>, and they shall deal with thee in fury <WH2534>; they shall take away <WH5493> thy nose <WH639> and thine ears <WH241>; and thy residue <WH319> shall fall <WH5307> by the sword <WH2719>: they shall take <WH3947> thy sons <WH1121> and thy daughters <WH1323>; and thy residue <WH319> shall be devoured <WH398> by the fire <WH784>.
They shall also strip <WH6584> thee of thy clothes <WH899>, and take away <WH3947> thy fair <WH8597> jewels <WH3627>.

Thus will I make thy lewdness <WH2154> to cease <WH7673> from thee <WH2184>, and thy whoredom brought from the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>; so that thou shalt not lift up <WH5375> thine eyes <WH5869> unto them <WH2142>, nor remember Egypt any more <WH4714>.

For thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>: Behold <WH5414>, I will deliver thee into the hand <WH3027> of them whom thou hatest <WH8130>, into the hand <WH3027> of them from whom thy soul <WH5315> is alienated <WH5361>;

and they shall deal <WH6213> with thee in hatred <WH8135>, and shall take away <WH3947> all thy labor <WH3018>, and shall leave <WH5800> thee naked <WH5903> and bare <WH6181>; and the nakedness <WH6172> of thy whoredoms <WH2183> shall be uncovered <WH1540>, both thy lewdness <WH2154> and thy whoredoms <WH8457>.
These things shall be done <WH6213> unto thee <WH2181>, for that thou hast played the harlot after <WH310> the nations <WH1471>, and because thou art polluted <WH2930> with their idols <WH1544>.
Thou hast walked <WH1980> in the way <WH1870> of thy sister <WH269>; therefore will I give <WH5414> her cup <WH3563> into thy hand <WH3027>.

Thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>: Thou shalt drink <WH8354> of thy sister <WH269>'s cup <WH3563>, which is deep <WH6013> and large <WH7342>; thou shalt be laughed to scorn <WH6712> and had in derision <WH3933>; it containeth <WH3557> much <WH4767>.

Thou shalt be filled <WH4390> with drunkenness <WH7943> and sorrow <WH3015>, with the cup <WH3563> of astonishment <WH8047> and desolation <WH8077>, with the cup <WH3563> of thy sister <WH269> Samaria <WH8111>.

Thou shalt even drink <WH8354> it and drain it out <WH4680>, and thou shalt gnaw <WH1633> the sherds <WH2789> thereof <WH5423>, and shalt tear thy breasts <WH7699>; for I have spoken <WH1696> it <WH5002>, saith the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH7911>: Because thou hast forgotten me <WH7993>, and cast me behind <WH310> thy back <WH1458>, therefore bear <WH5375> thou also thy lewdness <WH2154> and thy whoredoms <WH8457>.
Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> moreover unto me <WH1121>: Son of man <WH120>, wilt thou judge <WH8199> Oholah <WH170> and Oholibah <WH172>? then declare <WH5046> unto them their abominations <WH8441>.

For they have committed adultery <WH5003>, and blood <WH1818> is in their hands <WH3027>; and with their idols <WH1544> have they committed adultery <WH5003>; and they have also caused their sons <WH1121>, whom they bare <WH3205> unto me <WH5674>, to pass through the fire unto them to be devoured <WH402>.
Moreover this they have done <WH6213> unto me <WH2930>: they have defiled my sanctuary <WH4720> in the same day <WH3117>, and have profaned <WH2490> my sabbaths <WH7676>.

For when they had slain <WH7819> their children <WH1121> to their idols <WH1544>, then they came <WH935> the same day <WH3117> into my sanctuary <WH4720> to profane <WH2490> it <WH6213>; and, lo, thus have they done in the midst <WH8432> of my house <WH1004>.

And furthermore <WH637> ye have sent <WH7971> for men <WH582> that come <WH935> from far <WH4801>, unto whom a messenger <WH4397> was sent <WH7971>, and <WH935>, lo, they came; for whom thou didst wash <WH7364> thyself <WH3583>, paint thine eyes <WH5869>, and deck <WH5710> thyself with ornaments <WH5716>,
and sit <WH3427> upon a stately <WH3520> bed <WH4296>, with a table <WH7979> prepared <WH6186> before <WH6440> it <WH7760>, whereupon thou didst set mine incense <WH7004> and mine oil <WH8081>.

And the voice <WH6963> of a multitude <WH1995> being at ease <WH7961> was with her <WH582>: and with men of the common sort <WH7230> were brought <WH935> drunkards <WH5436> from the wilderness <WH4057>; and they put <WH5414> bracelets <WH6781> upon the hands <WH3027> of them twain <WH8597>, and beautiful crowns <WH5850> upon their heads <WH7218>.
Then said <WH559> I of her that was old <WH1087> in adulteries <WH5004>, Now will they play <WH2181> the harlot with her <WH8457>, and she with them.
And they went in <WH935> unto her <WH935>, as they go in unto a <WH802> harlot <WH2181>: so went they in <WH935> unto Oholah <WH170> and unto Oholibah <WH172>, the lewd <WH2154> women <WH802>.

And righteous <WH6662> men <WH582>, they shall judge <WH8199> them with the judgment <WH4941> of adulteresses <WH5003>, and with the judgment <WH4941> of women that shed <WH8210> blood <WH1818>; because they are adulteresses <WH5003>, and blood <WH1818> is in their hands <WH3027>.
For thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH136>: I will bring up <WH5927> a company <WH6951> against them <WH5414>, and will give them to be tossed <WH2189> to and fro and robbed <WH957>.

And the company <WH6951> shall stone <WH7275> them with stones <WH68>, and despatch <WH1254> them with their swords <WH2719>; they shall slay <WH2026> their sons <WH1121> and their daughters <WH1323>, and burn up <WH8313> their houses <WH1004> with fire <WH784>.
Thus will I cause lewdness <WH2154> to cease <WH7673> out of the land <WH776>, that all women <WH802> may be taught <WH3256> not to do <WH6213> after your lewdness <WH2154>.

And they shall recompense <WH5414> your lewdness <WH2154> upon you <WH5375>, and ye shall bear the sins <WH2399> of your idols <WH1544>; and ye shall know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>.
